name: toasty ghosty
description:
The ghost is cold!! Help them find warm particles, and maybe they'll reveal more about themselves. Make the ghost a toasty ghosty!

This is Act 1 of Toasty Ghosty! Act 2: coming soon

NOTE: a video for the cut scene is black on itch.io

music: 

AcousticBreeze by Benjamin Tissot from bensound

Sad Day by Benjamin Tissot from bensound

Sound Effect:
